gatewayAccess.title: Gateway Access
gatewayAccess.subtitle: Where the dashboard connects and how it authenticates.
gatewayAccess.connectHint: Click Connect to apply connection changes.

snapshot.title: Snapshot
snapshot.subtitle: Latest gateway handshake information.
snapshot.channelsHint: Use Channels to link WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Signal, or iMessage.

auth.authRequired: This gateway requires auth. Add a token or password, then click Connect.
auth.authFailed: Auth failed. Re-copy a tokenized URL with
auth.authFailedHint: or update the token, then click Connect.

insecureContext.httpWarning: This page is HTTP, so the browser blocks device identity. Use HTTPS (Tailscale Serve) or open
insecureContext.httpFallback: If you must stay on HTTP, set

stats.instancesHint: Presence beacons in the last 5 minutes.
stats.sessionsHint: Recent session keys tracked by the gateway.

notes.title: Notes
notes.subtitle: Quick reminders for remote control setups.
notes.tailscaleServeHint: Prefer serve mode to keep the gateway on loopback with tailnet auth.
notes.sessionHygieneHint: Use /new or sessions.patch to reset context.
notes.cronRemindersHint: Use isolated sessions for recurring runs.
